jobs.title: Content Marketing Coordinator
jobs.description:
For this we need a marketing intern, someone to effectively convey our story, and more importantly, the stories of the businesses that we’re working with. Their main function would be to help produce work with this in mind, liaise with various media on these pieces, and to get our message across to as many people as possible. The end goal in mind is to become a mouthpiece for the small business community in the UK to allow them to have a stronger voice in deciding their future.


As marketing intern, you will be able to express your passion for marketing in all its forms. Being creative and goal orientated is of ample importance along with good organisational skills.


Working with us launches careers, and is meant for people who are determined to learn as much as possible about what it means to be a startup.


This is a voluntary position with expenses covered.

jobs.title: Events Coordinator
jobs.description:
This role entails keeping Launch22 on the forefront of innovation and thought leadership for the small business community through continuing our commitment to not only bring entrepreneurs together but to grow collaboratively.


As Events co-ordinator of Launch22 London, you will have the freedom to be as ambitious and creative as your mindset allows. Being goal orientated is of ample importance along with good interpersonal skills (duh!).


A deep understanding of not only what our members and the wider community want to hear, but also what they need to hear is a mindset that is also necessary.


Working with us launches careers, and is meant for people who are determined to learn as much as possible about what it means to be a startup.


This is a Volunteer position with expenses covered.


IT’S YOURS FOR THE TAKING
